metadata.title: CVE-2019-5789 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow that leads to a use-after-free in WebMIDI in GoogleChrome on Windows prior to 73.0.3683.75 allowed a remote attacker who hadcompromised the renderer process to execute arbitrary code via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
